IN THIS SAME CONNECTION SHE WROTE: "SOME HAVE FAILED 
                                                                           162
TO DISTINGUISH BETWEEN PURE GOLD AND MERE GLITTER."-- IBID. AND SHE ADDED, "THE TRUE RELIGION, THE ONLY RELIGION OF THE BIBLE, THAT TEACHES FORGIVENESS ONLY THROUGH THE MERITS OF A CRUCIFIED AND RISEN SAVIOUR, THAT ADVOCATES RIGHTEOUSNESS BY THE FAITH OF THE SON OF GOD, HAS BEEN SLIGHTED, SPOKEN AGAINST, RIDICULED, AND REJECTED."--IBID., P. 468.
